list: "Although you'd like nothing more than to rip the envelope off this message and read the highly secret details inside, your conscience gets the better of you, and you decide instead to deliver it to Veliaf intact."
Come to the Al Kharid Market place! High quality produce at low, low prices! Show this flyer to a merchant for money off your next purchase, courtesy of Ali Morrisane!
You notice that the money off voucher is out of date.
Despite its age, the scroll is in near perfect condition. It's likely that some sort of magic was used to ensure it remained preserved.
You read the ancient shamans tome. It is written in a strange sort of language but you manage a rough translation.

...scattered are my hopes that I will ever be released from this flaming Octagram, it is the only thing which will contain this beast within. Although its grip over me is weakened with magic, it is hopeless to know if a saviour would guess this. I am doomed...
As you inspect the inscription on the tomb, you notice that the plaque it is on is loose. You remove the plaque, revealing a second inscription.
This is a piece of map that you got from Wormbrain, the goblin thief. You will need to join it to the other two map pieces before you can see the route to Crandor.
The Bank of RuneScape promises to pay the bearer, on demand, one Rune Pouch, provided the bearer is eligible to receive one. Use this Note on a bank booth to exchange it.
You already have one of those.
You exchange the promissory note.
You start the mediocre lengthed journey of clambering into the pipe...
You push your body down further into the pipe...
You see light from above, and start to climb upwards and out of the pipe system.

You pick up a new looking book: 'The Times of Lathas'. You skim over the heavy book. It talks about the heritage of the line of kings who carry the name Ardignas. They only came into power 68 years ago, but in which time there have been five kings, the current being King Lathas.

You pick on a new looking book: 'The Times of Ardignas'. You skim over the heavy book, it talks about the heritage of the line of Kings who carry the name Ardignas. They only came into power 68 years ago, but in which time there have been six kings, the current being King Thoros.
As you open the chest, you notice an inscription on the lid:

Here I rest the map to my beloved home. To whoever finds it, I beg of you, let it be. I was honour-bound not to destroy the map piece, but I have used all my magical skill to keep it from being recovered.

This map leads to the lair of the beast that destroyed my home, devoured my family, and burned to a cinder all that I love. But revenge would not benefit me now, and to disturb this beast is to risk bringing its wrath down upon another land.
I cannot stop you from taking this map piece now, but think of this: if you can slay the Dragon of Crandor, you are a greater hero than my land ever produced. There is no shame in backing out now.
You inspect the tablet, and sense a magical power, running your fingers over the inscriptions, they tingle as you get a feel for Drakan's power.
He must have stored one of his best spells in this tablet, perhaps he has some sort of device which could utilise it?
As the medallion and tablet are held together, a surge of power connects the two. After a brief moment, the tablet crumbles, and the medallion feels somehow different.
The locket opens, revealing a note inside.
The needle looks like it could handle the strange fabric that essence pouches are made of. Its magic might even expand their essence holding capabilities.
It would be best to empty all your pouches before attempting to combine them.
You need a small, medium, large and giant pouch in order to combine them together.
You are attempting to combine all your essence pouches into one colossal pouch. All of your essence pouches will be consumed in the process.

You attempt to stitch together all of the pouches. It's difficult, but you eventually craft a strange, kind of gross, fleshy container. It seems capable of storing up to [amount] essence at the moment.
You feed the egg to Little Nightmare. It starts to change...
You wrench the fang off the trident. Both items seem to be unharmed.
You adapt the visage to fit on a human head.
You sprinkle the dust over Lil' Zik. Congratulations! You may now metamorphise them.
You sprinkle the dust over Olmlet. Congratulations! You may now metamorphise them.
You add the orb to the staff.
You add the orb to the staff.
You add the orb to the staff.
You add the orb to the staff.
You add the orb to the staff.
You add the orb to the staff.
You remove the orb from the staff.
You remove the orb from the staff.
You remove the orb from the staff.
It's the jaw of a Basilisk Knight. Perhaps Olaf the Bard knows a good story about it.
It's the jaw of a Basilisk Knight. It looks like it could be attached to a Helm of Neitiznot.
You attach the Basilisk Jaw to the Helm of Neitiznot.
You remove the Basilisk Jaw from the Neitiznot Faceguard.
You attach the Basilisk Jaw to the Helm of Neitiznot.
Your scroll disintegrates as it recharges your jewellery.
Your scroll disintegrates as it recharges your jewellery.
Your scroll disintegrates as it recharges your jewellery.
Are you sure you wish to combine the Hydra Heart, the Hydra Eye, and Hydra Fang into the Brimstone Ring? This cannot be reversed.
You successfully combine the Hydra Heart, the Hydra Eye, and the Hydra Fang into the Brimstone Ring.
Are you sure you wish to combine the Hydra Heart, the Hydra Eye, and Hydra Fang into the Brimstone Ring? This cannot be reversed.
You successfully combine the Hydra Heart, the Hydra Eye, and the Hydra Fang into the Brimstone Ring.
Are you sure you wish to combine the Hydra Heart, the Hydra Eye, and Hydra Fang into the Brimstone Ring? This cannot be reversed.
You successfully combine the Hydra Heart, the Hydra Eye, and the Hydra Fang into the Brimstone Ring.
Are you sure you wish to alchemically combine the Holy sandals and Drake's tooth to create Devout boots? This cannot be reversed.
You successfully combine the Holy sandals and Drake's tooth to create Devout boots.
You use the water to help you sift through the dung. In doing so, you find a strange egg.
You search the chest and discover a mask inside.
You search the chest and discover a mask inside. However, you do not have enough room to take it.
You search the chest, but find nothing of note inside.
You add an entry to Kharedst's Memoirs.
You find a key hidden under the flower pot.
Congratulations! You've unlocked new metamorphosis options for your pet.
This leather looks pretty tough to work with... Maybe the dragonkin had a way.
Creating a venator bow requires five venator shards. You need [number] more.
Do you wish to use five venator shards to create a venator bow? This process is non-reversible.
You use five venator shards to create a venator bow.

The sign has some rough text carved into it: 'Here lies the Dungeon of Tolna! Since the rescue of Tolna from this rift, the monsters below have improved their combat strengths - so beware! Just because you found the monsters easy to kill last time, doesn't mean they will be easy this time!'
It's an ancient coffin with a strange rod fused to the top. The rod gives out a mixture of both mortal and divine energies and seems to be made out of a unique silver and mithril alloy.
This is a piece of map that you found in a secret chest in the Dwarven Mine. You will need to join it to the other two map pieces before you can see the route to Crandor.
This is a piece of map that you found Melzar's Maze. You will need to join it to the other two map pieces before you can see the route to Crandor.
In sunrise's wealthy glow, the security of my feelings will grow.
Where a good king sits his throne, my lover's heart becomes my own.
Just South of town can my champion be found, tending cautiously to fertile ground.
To the West where waters roar, a barbaric heart begins to thaw.
You touch the frozen tablet. You feel a surge of energy run through your body, hearing the word 'Ghorrock' echo in your mind.
You hold the frozen tablet against the ring of shadows causing the tablet to shatter, transferring its power into the ring.
You touch the strangled tablet. You feel a surge of energy run through your body, hearing the word 'Stranglewood' echo in your mind.
You hold the strangled tablet against the ring of shadows causing the tablet to shatter, transferring its power into the ring.
You touch the sirenic tablet. You feel a surge of energy run through your body, hearing the word 'Lassar' echo in your mind.
You hold the sirenic tablet against the ring of shadows causing the tablet to shatter, transferring its power into the ring.
You search through the camping equipment, but find nothing of interest.
You search through the camping equipment and find some secateurs. However, you don't have enough room to take them.
You search through the camping equipment and find some secateurs. You take them.
You touch the scarred tablet. You feel a surge of energy run through your body, hearing the word 'Scar' echo in your mind.
You hold the scarred tablet against the ring of shadows causing the tablet to shatter, transferring its power into the ring.
It's a strange chunk of quartz filled with an ancient magical power. You might be able to combine it with something else.
Are you sure you wish to combine the Smoke quartz and Ancient sceptre to create a Smoke ancient sceptre?
You successfully combine the Smoke quartz and Ancient sceptre to create a Smoke ancient sceptre.
It's a strange chunk of quartz filled with an ancient magical power. You might be able to combine it with something else.

You successfully combine the Shadow quartz and Ancient sceptre to create a Shadow ancient sceptre.

Are you sure you wish to combine the Ice quartz and Ancient sceptre to create an Ice ancient sceptre?
You successfully combine the Ice quartz and Ancient sceptre to create an Ice ancient sceptre.
It's an ancient vestige filled with power. You might be able to combine it with something else.
It's an ancient icon filled with power. You might be able to use it to craft a powerful ring.
Craft a Magus ring? This process cannot be reversed.
You successfully craft a Magus ring.
It's an ancient vestige filled with power. You might be able to combine it with something else.
It's an ancient vestige filled with power. You might be able to combine it with something else.
It's an ancient vestige filled with power. You might be able to combine it with something else.

Craft an Ultor ring? This process cannot be reversed.
You successfully craft an Ultor ring.

Craft a Bellator ring? This process cannot be reversed.
You successfully craft a Bellator ring.
It's an ancient icon filled with power. You might be able to use it to craft a powerful ring.
Craft a Venator ring? This process cannot be reversed.
You successfully craft a Venator ring.
You need a Combat level of 85 to start this quest.
Reading through the scroll reveals the secret to infusing Splitbark armour with Blood runes at a Blood Altar to create Bloodbark armour!
You've already gained the knowledge to infuse Splitbark armour with Blood runes.
Reading through the scroll reveals the secret to infusing Splitbark armour with Nature runes at a Nature altar to create Swampbark armour!
You've already gained the knowledge to infuse Splitbark armour with Nature runes.
The amulet is giving off unfamiliar magical energies.
You should give this to the Mage of Zamorak instead of drinking it.
You don't understand the incantation. It needs the knowledge of a wizard.
You find treasure, supplies, and a weirdly coloured egg sac within the chest.
You find treasure and supplies within the chest.
Congratulations! You've unlocked a new metamorphosis option for your pet.
Congratulations! You've unlocked a new metamorphosis option for your pet.
Congratulations! You've unlocked a new metamorphosis option for your pet.
Congratulations! You've unlocked a new metamorphosis option for your pet.
Congratulations! You've unlocked a new metamorphosis option for your pet.
A magical piece of bone, turned strong and hard over the course of time. It looks like it could fit Osmumten's Fang.
You carefully attach the phalanx to the fang. Its bony structure expands, completely overtaking the weapon.
The Phalanx only looks compatible with Osmumten's Fang.
Are you sure you wish to break down the Berserker ring into a Berserker icon? This cannot be reversed.
You successfully break down the Berserker ring into a Berserker icon.
You have no reason to do that.
Are you sure you wish to break down the Archers ring into a Archer icon? This cannot be reversed.
You successfully break down the Archers ring into a [sic] Archer icon.
You have no reason to do that.
Are you sure you wish to break down the Seers ring into a Seers icon? This cannot be reversed.
You successfully break down the Seers ring into a Seers icon.
You have no reason to do that.
Are you sure you wish to break down the Warrior ring into a Warrior icon? This cannot be reversed.
You successfully break down the Warrior ring into a Warrior icon.
You have no reason to do that.
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment. It appears to be an archaic invocation of the gods! Would you like to absorb its power?
You study the scroll and learn a new prayer: Augury
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment. It appears to be an archaic invocation of the gods. However there's nothing more for you to learn.
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment. It appears to be an archaic invocation of the gods! Would you like to absorb its power?
You study the scroll and learn a new prayer: Preserve
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment. It's an archaic invocation of the gods. However there's nothing more for you to learn.
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment. It appears to be an archaic invocation of the gods! Would you like to absorb its power?
You study the scroll and learn a new prayer: Rigour
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment. It appears to be an archaic invocation of the gods. However there's nothing more for you to learn.
It's a map of the Barrows Crypt. You carefully study it and memorise all the details. You then discard it.
You find a knife inside the old tattered backpack.
You twist the vines together to make a long vine.
The book is written in a language that you don't understand. Safalaan will know what to do with it.

pic: Old note (Sins of the Father) detail.png
list: You find an old note on the shelves.
It's Fox's report. It details the creature he was tracking, his attack, and my help.
This whistle requires a knife and one set of willow logs.
You craft yourself a basic quetzal whistle.
This whistle requires a knife and one set of yew logs.
You craft yourself an enhanced quetzal whistle.
This whistle requires a knife and one set of redwood logs.
You craft yourself a perfected quetzal whistle.
You create a Sunlight Hunters' Crossbow.
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment, revealing the secrets of teleport negation. Would you like to absorb their power?
You study the scroll and become immune to the Abyssal demon and Elder Chaos druid teleportation attacks.
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment, but there's nothing more for you to learn.
It's a short message from Vertida to Veliaf. It confirms that the Sanguinesti order of the Myreque is operational, but in need of support.
The 'Teleport to Target' spell requires level 85 Magic, and can be cast only within the Wilderness, while you have a Target. This scroll will be destroyed when it has been read.
You have learnt the 'Teleport to Target' spell.
You have already unlocked the spell. The scroll can be sold if you no longer need it.
You flick through a lifetime of notes on demon slaying, absorbing what you can. One passage catches your eye...
You flick through the old notes, but don't learn anything new.
You bring the two claws together and combine them.
Warning! The Amulet of fury will consume your Blood shard to make the Amulet of blood fury and you won't be able to get it back.
The Amulet of blood fury is untradeable.
You have successfully created an Amulet of blood fury.
You have successfully added 10,000 hits to your Amulet of blood fury. It will now work for (amount of charges) more hits.
You can use this on Nigel in Lumbridge to unlock the Deadman: Armageddon ornament theme for your capes.
You can use this on Nigel in Lumbridge to unlock the Deadman: Armageddon ornament theme for your weapons.
This scroll will unlock a new Home Teleport animation from Deadman: Armageddon. Would you like to read the scroll?
You feel empowered by the scroll and learn the Deadman: Armageddon Home Teleport. This can be toggled by right-clicking on the Home Teleport in your spellbook.
This scroll contains an incantation which unlocks the Deadman: Armageddon home teleport animation. However you have already unlocked this animation.
You read the wall plaque: 'Blessings on Efaritay, our icyene queen from far off lands and her loving children of Hallowed name.'
You add an entry to Kharedst's Memoirs.
You add an entry to Kharedst's Memoirs.
You add an entry to Kharedst's Memoirs.
You add an entry to Kharedst's Memoirs.
It's an icon from an old ring. With the help of a Fremennik, you might be able to combine it with something else.
Are you sure you wish to combine the Seers icon, Magus vestige and 500 blood runes to create a Magus icon?
You successfully combine the Seers icon, Magus vestige and 500 blood runes to create a Magus icon.
You reach over to pick up the bowl of water...
Are you sure you wish to alchemically combine the Boots of stone and Drake's claw to create Boots of brimstone? This cannot be reversed.
You successfully combine the Boots of stone and Drake's claw to create Boots of brimstone.
Do you wish to use the araxyte fang on your amulet of torture? This process is non-reversible and will consume both items.
You successfully create a [sic] amulet of rancour.
Do you wish to combine all three pieces to create a noxious halberd? This process is non-reversible.
You successfully create a noxious halberd.
Creating a Noxious Halberd requires level 72 crafting & smithing. [sic]
Creating a noxious halberd requires at least one noxious [point/pommel/blade] [sic]

Congratulations! You've unlocked a new metamorphosis option for your pet.
A strange wall which appears to have rubble blocking it, perhaps it can be cleared away?
You reveal a tunnel behind the wall.
The upgraded version has the same stats and behaviour, but is untradeable. Although you can revert it to its original form, you will not get the upgrade kit back.
You apply the upgrade.
The upgraded version has the same stats and behaviour, but is untradeable. Although you can revert it to its original form, you will not get the upgrade kit back.
You apply the upgrade.
You remove the upgrade.
You remove the upgrade.
Fallen from the centre of a Grotesque Guardian. This could be attached to a pair of Bandos boots...
Do you really want to combine these items together into Guardian boots? You cannot undo this process.
The second you hold your tourmaline core by the Bandos boots, the core is absorbed rapidly. Perhaps there is some link between the metal in Bandos and tourmaline...

A magical dye. It looks like it could fit a fortified version of Elidinis' Ward.
The dye only looks compatible with the fortified version of Elidinis' Ward.
Perhaps Ava would like to see this?
You infuse the power of Vorkath's head into your Ranging cape.
You infuse the power of Vorkath's head into your Ranging cape(t).
The squirrel carefully crunches the calcified acorn and magically turns into a skeleton. Whoops!
The squirrel happily eats the dark acorn and magically turns into a darker colour. How unexpected.
You open the box and find a rotten tomato.
You open the box and find a smelly sock.
You successfully repair your zombie helmet.
You use the key and it is absorbed by the gateway as it activates...
You enter the passageway, and it takes you to the roof of the tower.
You use the key and it is absorbed by the gateway as it activates...
You ring the bell, the sound echoes out across the roof...
The top is coated in blood from your fight with the mourner. It will need cleaning before it can be used.
The trousers are ripped from your fight with the mourner. They will need fixing before they can be used.
WARNING: You will not be able to re-obtain the Avernic hilt. It will become too damaged in the process and you will be left with only a Dragon defender.
You dismantle your Avernic defender and are left with only a Dragon defender.
The axe isn't in a great state, but it should be possible to repair it. However, you unfortunately don't feel you have the skills needed to do so yourself. To repair the axe, you'll need 70 Smithing.
The axe isn't in a great state, but it should be possible to repair it. You reckon you have the skills needed to do so yourself. You'll just need a hammer and an anvil.
You bring the totem pieces together with a click. It looks kind of like an arcane key and pulses with dark power in your hand.
You bring the totem pieces together with a click. It looks kind of like an arcane key and pulses with dark power in your hand.
You bring the totem pieces together with a click. It looks kind of like an arcane key and pulses with dark power in your hand.
You bring the totem pieces together with a click. It looks kind of like an arcane key and pulses with dark power in your hand.
You search the skeleton carefully, and discover that it's made of bones.
You check for a wallet or watch, but someone must have looted them already.
You check for a pulse, but she's dead.
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment. It appears to be an archaic invocation of the gods! Would you like to absorb its power?
You study the scroll and learn a new prayer: Deadeye
You'll need a key to open this chest.
You take a note from the chest.
You can make out some faded words on the ancient parchment. It appears to be an archaic invocation of the gods! Would you like to absorb its power?
You study the scroll and learn a new prayer: Mystic Vigour
Steve Beanie on the Pandemonium can tell you more about what to do with this.
This crowbar can be used to pry open crates full of drinks while out at sea. You can then add them to your sea charts by sampling the drinks.
This tonic can be used to remove rust from Meaty Aura Logist's weather station when helping her to chart weather patterns in the sea. It can also be used to remove rust from swords.
This diving equipment works in place of the non- upgraded version. Higher level dives whilst charting the sea floor with mermaids will require this upgraded equipment.
This diving equipment works in place of the non- upgraded version. Higher level dives whilst charting the sea floor with mermaids will require this upgraded equipment.
Mudskipper Point. WARNING! BEWARE OF THE MUDSKIPPERS!
